author: Sune Urth
description: Perhaps not a Bourbon Street staple but characterful nonetheless with tequila, mezcal, aromatised wine, maraschino and orange bitters.
name: New Orleans Minute cocktail
recipeIngredient: 20 ml Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: POUR mezcal into chilled glass and swirl to coat
STIR other ingredients with ice and strain into mezcal rinsed glass
